name: Yellowstone National Park
description: First national park in the U.S. known for geothermal features.

name: Yosemite National Park
description: Famous for its waterfalls, granite cliffs, and giant sequoias.

name: Grand Canyon National Park
description: A steep-sided canyon carved by the Colorado River.

name: Great Smoky Mountains National Park
description: Known for its biodiversity, mist-covered mountains, and Appalachian culture.

name: Zion National Park
description: Known for its steep red cliffs and Zion Canyon.

name: Rocky Mountain National Park
description: Known for its majestic mountain views, alpine lakes, and wildlife.

name: Acadia National Park
description: Famous for its coastal beauty and diverse ecosystems.

name: Glacier National Park
description: Known for its stunning mountain landscapes and wildlife.

name: Olympic National Park
description: Known for its diverse ecosystems, from coastal beaches to temperate rainforests.

name: Everglades National Park
description: Famous for its vast wetlands and rich biodiversity.

name: Mount Rainier National Park
description: Famous for its glaciers, wildflower meadows, and the iconic Mount Rainier.

name: Badlands National Park
description: Known for its dramatic landscapes and rich fossil beds.

name: Denali National Park
description: Home to North America's tallest peak, Mount Denali.

name: Canyonlands National Park
description: Known for its unique rock formations and vast canyons.

name: Joshua Tree National Park
description: Known for its iconic Joshua Trees and desert landscapes.

name: Arches National Park
description: Famous for its stunning natural sandstone arches.

name: Bryce Canyon National Park
description: Known for its unique hoodoos and dramatic rock formations.

name: Hawai'i Volcanoes National Park
description: Home to active volcanoes, including KÄ«lauea and Mauna Loa.

name: Shenandoah National Park
description: Known for its scenic Skyline Drive and rolling mountains.

name: Sequoia National Park
description: Home to the largest trees in the world, the giant sequoias.
